There are quite some fields in space science which would allow you an opportunity to work in the field of space. They are :- Aerospace or Aeronautical Engineers.Avionics & Instrumentation Engineers.Robotics Engineers.Spacecraft Engineers.CosmologyAstrobiology .. And Some more.Astronauts being the most famous among them all, but, Every country and especially India, that operates a space exploration program has a limited number of career opportunities for astronauts. Individuals who want to pursue careers as astronauts must undergo rigorous training and meet stringent physical fitness criteria. Competition for these positions is fierce, and only the most outstanding candidates are likely to be accepted.
